params._reserveAmount: Amount of reserved deposited by a link of the user

params._keepers: List with keeprs of the assets to whitelist

params._publicGardenStrategistsStewards: Public garden, public strategist rights and public stewards rights
params._reserveAsset: Reserve asset of the Garden. Initially just weth
params._seed: Seed to regenerate the garden NFT

params._curveMetaRegistry: Address of the new curve meta registry

params._newGardenFactory: Address of the new garden factory

params._newGardenNFT: Address of the new garden NFT

params._gardenValuer: Address of the new garden valuer

params._newMinLiquidityReserve: Absolute min liquidity of an asset to grab price
params._reserve: Address of the reserve to edit

params._mardukGate: Address of the new Marduk Gate

params._priceOracle: Address of the new price oracle

params._newStrategyFactory: Address of the new strategy factory

params._newStrategyNFT: Address of the new strategy NFT

params._newTreasury: Address of the new protocol fee recipient

params._contract: Smartcontract address to check for a global or specific pause

params._garden: Address of the Garden contract to remove

params._reserveAsset: Address of the reserve asset to remove

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._state: True to pause, false to unpause.

params._newDefaultMasterSwapper: Address of the new default trade integration

params._operation: Address of the operation contract to set

params._address: Addresses of protocol smartcontract to be paused

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

ActionPaused(bool).notice: Emitted when an action is paused globally

ActionPausedIndividually(address,bool).notice: Emitted when an action is paused individually

NewPauseGuardian(address,address).notice: Emitted when pause guardian is changed

addAffiliateReward(address,uint256).notice: PRIVILEGED FUNCTION. Adds the affiliate rewards earned by an user Only a garden can call this

addKeeper(address).notice: PRIVILEGED FUNCTION. Adds a new valid keeper to the list

addKeepers(address[]).notice: PRIVILEGED FUNCTION. Adds a list of assets to the whitelist

addReserveAsset(address).notice: PRIVILEGED FUNCTION. Adds a new valid reserve asset for gardens

claimRewards().notice: Claims affiliate rewards Controller needs to hold BABL.

createGarden(address,string,string,strin.notice: Creates a Garden smart contract and registers the Garden with the controller. If asset is not WETH, the creator needs to approve the controller

editCurveMetaRegistry(address).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to edit the curve meta registry

editGardenFactory(address).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to edit the protocol garden factory

editGardenNFT(address).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to edit the protocol garden NFT

editGardenValuer(address).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to change the garden valuer

editHeart(address).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to edit the heart contract

editLiquidityReserve(address,uint256).notice: GOVERNANCE FUNCTION: Edits the minimum liquidity an asset must have on Uniswap

editMardukGate(address).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to change the Marduk Gate Address

editPriceOracle(address).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to change the price oracle

editStrategyFactory(address).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to edit the protocol strategy factory

editStrategyNFT(address).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to edit the protocol strategy NFT

editTreasury(address).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to edit the protocol fee recipient

enableGardenTokensTransfers().notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows transfers of ERC20 gardenTokens Can only happen after 2021 is finished.

initialize().notice: Initializes the initial fee recipient on deployment.

isPaused(address).notice: Check whether or not there is a global pause or a specific pause of the provided contract address

isSystemContract(address).notice: Check if a contract address is a garden or one of the system contracts

removeGarden(address).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to remove a Garden

removeReserveAsset(address).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to remove a reserve asset

setGlobalPause(bool).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Pause the protocol globally in case of unexpected issue Only the governance can unpause it

setMasterSwapper(address).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to edit the protocol default trde integration

setOperation(uint8,address).notice: GOVERNANCE FUNCTION: Edit an existing operation on the registry

setPauseGuardian(address).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Set-up a pause guardian

setSomePause(address[],bool).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Pause some smartcontracts in a batch process in case of unexpected issue Only the governance can unpause it

updateGardenAffiliateRate(address,uint25.notice: PRIVILEGED FUNCTION. Updates the affiliate rate for a garden. 0 if none.

updateProtocolWantedAsset(address,bool).notice: PRIVILEGED FUNCTION. Updates a protocol wanted asset
